comments.text: Great article! I've been working remotely for years, and the tips here are super useful.
I think AI will definitely impact the job market. Excited to see where it goes.
Web development is changing so fast. Looking forward to the future!
The whole React and Redux thing still confuses me. Any recommendations for learning resources?
I’ve been using GraphQL for my latest project. It’s so much better than REST.
The guide on CSS Grid was so helpful. I never understood it until now.
Serverless architecture sounds cool, but I'm unsure about the cost effectiveness in the long run.
Do you recommend React over Vue for building modern web apps?
I’ve seen a lot of crypto-related posts lately. This one was quite informative.
